text.en:
This series of works uses long exposures to capture the scene where a laser cuts out a glowing cross-section of a tree. The work intends to create a new type of natural landscape and worship to combat the numbness of reality. Through the work, I hope to regain the attitude of surprise and curiosity about life, and to reconnect nature and the unknown separated by the urban order.

The work was shot during the quarantine period, which made me rethink the distortion, blurring and obscuration of perception caused by the social order. Although the development of science has separated people from the original worship of nature, the establishment of a new order has formed a new ignorance through the isolation of nature and the universal explanation of phenomena. I hope to reflect on this point through my work.

A new kind of nature worship represents questioning known explanations, remaining shocked by phenomena, and being in awe of the unknown.
text.cn:
本系列作品利用长曝光拍摄了激光切出树木发光横截面的场景。作品意在创造一种新型的自然景观和崇拜，以此对抗现实的麻木。通过这部作品，我希望能重获对生命的惊奇和好奇的态度，并重新连接被城市秩序所隔绝的自然与未知。

作品拍摄于隔离期间，这让我重新思考了由社会秩序引起的感知的扭曲、模糊和遮蔽。尽管科学的发展使人与原始的自然崇拜分离，但新秩序的建立，通过对自然的隔离和对现象的普遍解释，形成了一种新的无知。我希望通过我的作品对此进行反思。

一种新型的自然崇拜代表着质疑已知的解释，对现象保持震惊，并对未知心存敬畏。
